dmca.title: [EV1-C2092053T] Illegal and pirated information being hosted on your servers. http://
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Tamara Bryan, Helbreath USA [mailto:tbryan@ient.com] 
Sent: Monday, December 18, 2006 11:05 PM
To: DMCA
Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org
Subject: Re: [EV1-C2092053T] Illegal and pirated information being hosted on your
servers. http://hbsecrets.be/index2.php
Importance: High

Hello,

This should be enough. Please let me know if there is anything else required.

Sincerely,

Tamara Bryan
Helbreath USA
Game Master


----- Original Message -----
From: "DMCA" <dmca@theplanet.com>
To: <tbryan@ient.com>
Cc: <Theplanet@chillingeffects.org>
Sent: Tuesday, December 12, 2006 1:36 AM
Subject: FW: [EV1-C2092053T] Illegal and pirated information being hosted on your
servers. http://hbsecrets.be/index2.php


To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.

Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto:abuse@ev1servers.net]
Sent: Saturday, December 09, 2006 6:17 PM
To: DMCA
Subject: [EV1-C2092053T] Illegal and pirated information being hosted on your
servers. http://hbsecrets.be/index2.php

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Illegal and pirated information being hosted on your servers. 
http://hbsecrets.be/index2.php Added by system at Saturday, Dec 9 2006 07:59 pm
X-MailFrom: tbryan@ient.com
X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net
Received: from [70.87.6.111] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for
<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Sat Dec 9 19:59:26 2006
Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with
Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830);
  Sat, 9 Dec 2006 19:58:38 -0600
Return-path: <tbryan@ient.com>
Delivery-date: Sat, 09 Dec 2006 19:58:38 -0600
Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180]
helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com)  by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from
tbryan@ient.com)  with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256)
 (Exim)
 id 1GtDxd-0005eP-MM
 for abuse@theplanet.com; Sat, 09 Dec 2006 19:58:38 -0600

mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from tbryan@ient.com) with esmtps
(TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256)
(Exim)
id 1GtDxW-00059l-20
for abuse@theplanet.com; Sat, 09 Dec 2006 19:58:33 -0600

[211.30.141.115])
by mail05.syd.optusnet.com.au (8.13.1/8.13.1) with SMTP id kBA1un0F008821 for
<abuse@theplanet.com>; Sun, 10 Dec 2006 12:57:57 +1100
Message-ID: <008601c71bfe$7ccf6c00$5801a8c0@tam>
From: "Tamara Bryan, Helbreath USA" <tbryan@ient.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
Subject: Illegal and pirated information being hosted on your servers. 
http://hbsecrets.be/index2.php
Date: Sun, 10 Dec 2006 12:54:58 +1100
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: multipart/mixed;
boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0081_01C71C5A.65E48D20"
X-Priority: 3
X-MSMail-Priority: Normal
X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2900.2869
X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2962
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 10 Dec 2006 01:58:38.0676 (UTC) FILETIME=[B5A94140:01C71BFE]

 (multipart/mixed)
Multipart prefix (text/plain)
This is a multi-part message in MIME format.

 (multipart/alternative)
MIME element (text/plain)
Hello,



I am Tamara Bryan, Gamemaster of HelbreathUSA http://www.helbreathusa.com . 
I am contacting you in regards to the web site http://hbsecrets.be/index2.php



The official game site of the developer is located at 
http://www.helbreath.com and legally licensed by 
http://www.helbreathusa.com.  This web site is hosting information and files 
advertising and how to connect to their illegal server.  We, iENT, are 
authorized by the copyright owner, Siementech, to seek out and close illegal 
servers.



Their actions include copyright infringement and software piracy related 
material.  The source code for this game was illegally leaked to the public, 
and altered by those not authorized by the copyright holder.



The participants are violating the copyright agreement as your servers are 
being used in an illegal fashion. Please take care of this abuse of our 
copyright and your Terms of Service by removing this website.



Please advise me of exactly what action has been taken so that I can advise 
the copyright owner and get that information back to you with what's needed.



Thank you for your prompt action in this matter.



Sincerely again,



Tamara Bryan

Game Master Helbreath USA

Notification of Claimed Copyright Infringement
(Digital Millennium Copyright Act, 17 U.S.C.
